hero.title: Creating the digital future of the Crimean Tatar language
hero.subtitle: QIRI'M YOUNG develops innovative digital tools and platforms to preserve, learn, and develop the Crimean Tatar language for future generations. From a national corpus to parallel translation systems.
hero.description: Preserving Crimean Tatar language and culture through digital innovation.
hero.mission: Our mission is to preserve and develop the Crimean Tatar language through advanced technologies

about.title: About QIRI'M YOUNG
about.missionText: We develop digital infrastructure for the Crimean Tatar language through corpus linguistics, machine translation, and educational technologies. Our work ensures the preservation of linguistic data and creates tools for language learning and research.
about.visionText: A digitally empowered Crimean Tatar language that thrives in modern technology ecosystems, from search engines to AI applications, supporting native speakers worldwide.
about.valuesText: Scientific Approach, Open Source, Community Collaboration, Cultural Respect, Technical Excellence
about.storyText: QIRI'M YOUNG was founded in 2019 as a public organization dedicated to the preservation of the Crimean Tatar language through modern digital technologies. We work with universities, research institutes, and international organizations.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Digital tools and platforms for the development of Crimean Tatar language technologies

nationalCorpus.title: National Corpus of the Crimean Tatar Language
nationalCorpus.description: An open linguistic database with over 1 million words, supporting research and NLP development. Available at ctcorpus.org

parallelCorpus.title: Parallel Translation Corpus
parallelCorpus.description: English-Crimean Tatar parallel texts for training machine translation and bilingual research

languageCourses.title: Digital Learning Resources
languageCourses.description: Memrise, Quizlet, and Anki courses for English speakers learning Crimean Tatar

qirimkey.title: QırımKey Keyboard
qirimkey.description: The first iOS keyboard for the Crimean Tatar language with autocorrect support

research.title: Computational Linguistics Research
research.description: Academic publications and collaborations on the processing and preservation of the Crimean Tatar language

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.subtitle: Measurable results and the real-world impact of our mission to preserve and develop the Crimean Tatar language through digital innovation and community collaboration.

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.subtitle: Join our mission to preserve and develop the Crimean Tatar language through digital innovation. Together, we can ensure this beautiful language thrives in the digital age.

transparency.title: Transparency and Accountability
transparency.subtitle: We believe in full transparency regarding our mission, activities, and impact. Here you will find our financial reports, governance structure, and accountability measures.

news.title: News and Updates
news.subtitle: The latest developments, achievements, and project updates from QIRI'M YOUNG in its mission to preserve and develop the Crimean Tatar language through digital innovation.
news.followProgress: Follow our journey of creating digital tools for the preservation of the Crimean Tatar language.
